titleStmt.title: The vvorld that now is; and the vvorld that is to come: or The first and second coming of Jesus Christ Wherein several prophecies not yet fulfilled are expounded. By Han. Knollys, a servant of Jesus Christ. Rev. I. 19.
titleStmt.author: Knollys, Hanserd, 1599?-1691.

notesStmt.note: Caption title, "The world to come" has separate pagination and register; signatures begin with 'B'.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
